code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import BACKEND_URL from"../config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(){const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const processTender=async()=>{if(!file){alert("Please upload a tender PDF");return;}const formData=new FormData();formData.append("file",file);try{setLoading(true);const res=await axios.post("".concat(BACKEND_URL,"/process_tender_pdf"),formData,{headers:{"Content-Type":"multipart/form-data"}});setResult(res.data);}catch(err){alert("Failed to connect to backend");}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{background:"#e9e1f6",padding:32,borderRadius:18},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",style:{maxWidth:560,margin:"0 auto"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Upload Your Tender Document"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:16},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"small",children:"Browse Tender PDF"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",className:"input",onChange:e=>setFile(e.target.files[0])})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",style:{width:"50%"},onClick:processTender,disabled:loading,children:loading?"Processing...":"Generate Tender Summary"})]}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",style:{marginTop:24},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Tender Summary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{className:"small",children:JSON.stringify(result,null,2)})]})]});}
